title: ezkart | Pack of 5 - Multipack Assorted Colour Lighters with Adjustable Flame Lighter, refillable and child safe, Use for Camping, BBQ, Fireworks and much more (5)
features: Multi-pack Assorted Colour Lighters with Adjustable Flame Light, gives the end user a better experience and keeps them in control with the manual adjuster of the flame.
Better than long matches, Read all warnings before using this product. These lighters are child safe which gives the user more comfort knowing children will not be able to use these with ease.
Random colours will be dispatched, This sleek looking electronic lighter comes in the most vibrant colours, from red, orange, blue, green and purple and has a transparent body.
Pocket Friendly this will not ignite in your pocket, having this feature means the end user will be safe. Also child safe so kids will find it difficult to operate. keep out of reach from children.
Transparent body allows the end user to see the level of fuel at all times, knowing when its close to being empty so you can organise a refill at any given time.
description: Product Description Lighters Our Lighters - Multipack Assorted Colour Lighters with Adjustable Flame Light - Better than long matches, Read all warnings before using this product. - Will dispatch with Random Colours. Key Features - Adjustable Flame - Refillable - Easy to use - Transparent Refillable Turn the lighter upside down and connect the two ends to each others refill section. Multipack Multipacks available from: - 5 Pack - 10 Pack - 25 Pack - 50 Pack Lighters Dimensions Dimensions - 10 x 4 x 2 cm Refillable At the bottom of the lighter it can be refilled easily. Adjustable Flame Allows you to take control on how high or low you would like the flame to be. Usage / Troubleshooting Within the lighter there are two fuel chambers, to view a full chamber rotate the item from left to right. Please ensure this item is not dropped on the floor as it could cause damage to the internal components and cause the item to stop working.
